CustomField.description: 8-character CLLI™ of the telephone switch equipment building which serves the NPANXX assigned to this business. The NPANXX is the first 6 digits of the telephone number and are compared to Telcordia® LERG™ data to determine the CLLI™. If the telephone number has been ported to another switch this field reflects the initial NPANXX Central Office assignment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 8-character CLLI™ of the telephone switch equipment building which serves the NPANXX assigned to this business.
CustomField.label: NPANXX Central Office
